hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: datasetId
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The ID of the dataset to be loaded e.g. dr893

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: mode
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Whether to use cluster or not. Cluster is recommended for datasets over 100k records.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: dwcaToVerbatim
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Run the load of DwCA to AVRO

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: indexRecords
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Run index generation (generates the AVRO files - not SOLR)

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: asyncUpload
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Run async image upload or synchronous.
